content.text:
# List of Padma Shri award recipients in public affairs

This is a list of recipients of the Padma Shri award, the fourth-highest civilian award of the Republic of India, in the field of Civil Service. As of 2025, a total of 70 individuals have been awarded Padma Shri for their contributions in the field of Public Affairs.
Recipients
